headline: Gloat Recognized Among Gartner Research’s "AI Reshapes the Job Architecture and Job Description Technology Market" and "AI Use-Case Assessment for Learning and Development"
summary: NEW YORK, November 24, 2025--Gloat, the enterprise work orchestration platform, was named in two Gartner publications in October: "AI Reshapes the Job Architecture and Job Description Technology Market" and "AI Use-Case Assessment for Learning and Development" recognized for its Jobs Management Technology.

raw.headline: Gloat Recognized Among Gartner Research’s "AI Reshapes the Job Architecture and Job Description Technology Market" and "AI Use-Case Assessment for Learning and Development"

headline: 3 Reasons IT is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Gartner’s stock price has taken a beating over the past six months, shedding 47.3% of its value and falling to $234.30 per share. This may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
